Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
After that, the same exchange happened at another supermarket. 
I'm going to avoid visiting that shopping street for a while due to awkwardness.
……Well, if you say cats are cute then I guess they really are.
Vanilla: "N? Kun kun, kun kun..."
Vanilla: "There is an amazing smell coming from over there."
Chocola: "You're right! It smells delicious and fragrant, Master!"
Kashou: "Indeed. This scent is…"
He turns his face in the direction of the source of the aroma. 
Stall Cat: "Welcome!"
Stall Cat: "Freshly made takoyaki, anyone?"
Stall Cat: "Hot off the grill and topped with plenty of bonito flakes! How about some takoyaki?"
Chocola: "Wow, a cat running a takoyaki stall! That's unusual, Master!"

metadata:

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "I want to become a good girl!"
Vanilla: "Shigure, you're strict. But I learned quite a lot thanks to her."
Store Owner: "Oh? So she is a nice Master?"
Chocola: "Ah, but the Master is still our Master!"
Chocola: "And Shigure-chan remains Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"
Vanilla: "To put it simply, Shigure's an important friend."
Vanilla: "We only call him 'Master' when referring to this one here."
Store Owner: "Ahaha. You are well loved, aren’t you, Master?"
Kashou: "Well, I am grateful for that."

I was lightly nudged with my elbow. 
A slightly embarrassed and wry smile crossed my face as a response.
……It's still somewhat embarrassing outside like this.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
Looking at the mobile phone, which emits a merciless electronic sound. 
I thought I could resolve things quickly if only I had contact with Shigure...
Chocola: "Hamu, ngungungu, breakfast is delicious!"
Chocola: "Master's meals are always tasty nyaa~♪"
Vanilla: "Chocola, ketchup has gotten on your cheek." 
Vanilla: "Artistically cute. I will lick it off for you. Peropero."
The two of them happily munch away at their sandwiches.
By the way, inside is tomato and cheese with lettuce.
And a simple one filled with runny fried eggs as well.
Well, this kind of thing isn't unusual for breakfast. 
Kashou: "You guys will finally go home today, right?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
A cheerful smile accompanied the bill and pen handed to me.
Kashou: "Now, um..."
I re-checked the received invoice. 
Kashou: "...It seems like something isn't quite right with what I ordered."
Dishware Vendor: "...Huh? Really?"
Dishware Vendor: "So you mean that there is a discrepancy in your order...?"
Kashou: "No, it looks as though the items I did request are included somewhere..." 
My gaze shifted to piles of cardboard boxes stacked inside.
The small shop was filled with mountains upon mountains of cardboard boxes.
In fact, almost all space within had been taken over by these cartons.
Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need this many dishes here at our place..." 
Dishware Vendor: "S-sorry! I will immediately check back to headquarters!"
Dishware Vendor: "Would it be alright if I asked for a moment of your time?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Dish Merchant]: "It seems there was a mix-up with another order sheet on our end..."
[Dish Merchant]: "I believe you, Minaduki-sama, will need these quite urgently as well so..."
[Dish Merchant]: "If it's alright with you, I thought perhaps you could take receipt of the dishes for your current order?"
[Kashou]: "Take receipt of my order...?"
[Kashou]: "...Huh? From within this pile?"
A towering mountain of cardboard boxes. 
I find myself momentarily lost for words.
They are all uniformly identical in appearance, after all.
One cannot discern what lies inside until the box is opened.
Furthermore, upon examining each shipping slip, it becomes clear that these contain only sets and individual pieces from our highest-quality tea wares or dishware collections. 
Therefore, extreme care must be taken when handling them to avoid any mishaps.
[Kashou]: "Um, certainly I'm also preparing for the grand opening so receiving this today would indeed make me happy..."
[Kashou]: "...But taking all of these now will take quite a bit of time, won’t it?"

reference_answer:

It would take at least two hours even if it looks light. And re-delivery is a waste of time...
KASHOU: "…………Hm?"
CHOCOLA & VANILLA: "Jii"
KASHOU: "I have cat hands!?"
CHOCOLA & VANILLA: "Nyaa!? What's going on!?"

Question:

窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "......If I could live as simply as a cat, things would be easier." 
Looking at the shop name posted on the window.
Shaking off his wry smile, he began unpacking the freshly delivered tea set.
Vanilla: "Huh? That takoyaki stall isn't here today."
The park street in the same evening time as yesterday.
But there are no stalls to be found today. 
I can’t send these cats home because nobody is around when I need them, and I left my key at our house anyway.
So I decided on a quick shopping trip while waiting for Shigure's return.
Chocola: "......Huh? Oh, sorry Vanilla!"
Chocola: "What was it again... catnip?" 
Vanilla: "Something like that."

Question:

[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」

バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Chocola, if you're tired, maybe take a little rest?"
Chocola: "A-yes, just for a bit..."
Chocola: "But I am alright. Sorry to worry you, Master."
Minaduki Kashou: "...It isn’t something worth apologizing about.”
He lowers his head with an awkward smile. 
I already know the reason why she's not energetic so there is nothing more for me to say.
Therefore all that I can do now is remain silent.
Minaduki Kashou: "Well, since we have a bench right over here, maybe you should rest?"
Vanilla: “Then I’ll go buy some drinks.” 
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, sure. Get enough for everyone."
Vanilla: "Understood. Leave it to me.”
I hand Vanilla the coins and urge Chocola towards a bench.
The sea breeze blowing through rustles in all of the trees within this park.

Going forward feels slightly unsettling though.

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「形も揃って時間は容赦なく過ぎてくけど……」
今朝届いたばかりのショップカードに手を伸ばす。
[ショコラ]: 「にゃにゃにゃっ！？　ご主人さま、なんですか！　それはなんですかー！」
[バニラ]: 「おお。これはもしや、ショップカードというやつでは」
[ショコラ]: 「すごい、すごいですご主人さま！　お店の住所とか電話番号まで書いてますよー！」
[バニラ]: 「お店の情報がもろバレの一枚」
[バニラ]: 「個人情報保護にうるさい時代に危機感のない」
[嘉祥]: 「いやショップカードってそういうもんだから」
個人情報保護とか知ってるのにショップカードは知らないのか。
まぁ確かに変な営業とか来たら面倒だけども。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Time did fly by when we were trying to get everything prepared though...」
I reached for the business cards that had just arrived that morning.
[Chocola]: 「Meow meow meow?! Master, what are those?! Just what could those be?」
[Vanilla]: 「Ohh. Could those be those things called "business cards?"」
[Chocola]: 「Amazing! That's amazing, Master! It even has the shop's address and phone number on it!」
[Vanilla]: 「It's a single card that tells you everything about this shop.」
[Vanilla]: 「You have no sense of discretion in an era where everyone is protective of their privacy.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's exactly what business cards are used for.」
She knew about protecting personal information, but not about business cards...?
Well, it was true that it would be a pain if I was in some sort of strange business or something.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Shapes align, and time passes relentlessly..."
I reach for the shop card that just arrived this morning.
Chocola: "Nya nya nya!? Master, what is it! What's that?"
Vanilla: "Oh my. Is this perhaps one of those 'shop cards' I hear about?"
Chocola: "Amazing, amazing Master! It even has the store address and phone number on it!"
Vanilla: "A card revealing all sorts of shop information."
Vanilla: "It doesn’t seem to grasp any sense of urgency in this age where personal data protection is paramount.”
Minaduki Kashou: “No, that's just how shop cards are supposed to be.”
I know about protecting personal info but don’t recognize a shop card? 
Well, it can get annoying when you have weird sales calls though.

Question:
[バニラ]: 「にゃっ！（ぱしっ）」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「にゃにゃー！　にゃにゃにゃにゃにゃーっ！！（ぱしっ、ぱしっ）」
[嘉祥]: 「……やっぱりネコなんだなぁ」
普通の猫用のオモチャに夢中になってる二匹を見て実感。
まぁご自由にって書いてあるし、とりあえずほっとこう。
[嘉祥]: 「えーと、ネコ関係の本はどこだろうな……」
店内を見渡しているとエプロンを付けた店員さんが近寄って来てくれる。
[店員]: 「何かお探しですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ネコの飼い方の本とかってありますか？　人型ネコの」
[店員]: 「はい、もちろんございますよ。こちらになります」
[嘉祥]: 「……ずいぶんたくさんあるんですね、ネコの本って」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「...... Meow! Fwahp!」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Meow meow! Meow, meow meow, meow meow!! (Fwahp fwahp!)」
[Kashou]: 「... You two really are cats.」
That was how I felt, watching those two get so engrossed in a regular cat toy.
Well, it did say "Go Ahead," so for now, I'll just let them play with it.
[Kashou]: 「Hmm, where can I find books on catgirls...」
As I looked around the store, an apron-clad shop clerk came up to me.
[Shop Clerk]: 「Is there anything I can help you with?」
[Kashou]: 「Do you have any books on raising cats? The humanoid kind.」
[Shop Clerk]: 「Yes, certainly! They would be over here.」
[Kashou]: 「... Wow, there sure are a lot of books on catgirls.」
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "Nyaa! (Pash!)"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Nyan-nya! Nya nya nyan yan yaaa!! (Pash, Pash)"
Kashou: "...So they really are cats after all."
Realizing this as he watches the two engrossed in a typical cat toy. 
Well, it says 'feel free', so I guess I'll leave them alone for now.
Kashou: "Hmm, where would books about cats be?"
As he looks around the store, an employee wearing an apron approaches him.
Employee: "Are you looking for something in particular?"
Kashou: "Do you have any books on cat care? For humanoid cats."
Employee: "Yes, of course we do. Right this way."
Kashou: "...Wow, there are quite a few cat-related books here."

入店してきたお客に強烈に詰め寄る二匹を引っぺがす。

reference_answer:

[Female Customer]: 「Hyaaaaah?! Wh-Wh-What is going on?!」
[Chocola]: 「W-What would you like to meowrder?!」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, o-our special is that... that thing! Uhm, that!! Cake!!」

[Vanilla]: 「U-Uhm, the hot kind and uhm, the cold kind...!!」

I pulled them back after they quickly set themselves upon the customer who'd just walked in.

[Kashou]: 「Our menu is over here. Please peruse it at your leisur--」
ModelAnswer:

Female Customer: "Hyaa!? What is this?"
Chocola: "Go, what would you like to order?"
Chocola: "Ah, oh, the recommendation is that one, that one! Um, it's that one!! Cake!!"
Vanilla: "We also have tea... hot and cold..."
Vanilla: "Um, hot or cold? Hot or cold?!"
Kashou: "You two calm down a bit."

He pulls away from the customers who were aggressively approaching them.

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨？]: 「商売とは稼げる時には非情にでも稼がねば成り立たぬのです！」
[時雨？]: 「それに兄さまにそんな冷たい目で見られたら悲しい！　悲しいのです！」
[時雨？]: 「これでも何か力になれればと思って今日まで我慢をしましたのにっ……！　うぅぅっ……！！」
[嘉祥]: 「だから選り好みとかじゃなくてだな……」
泣きが入って来た上にキャラがブレブレ。
何が言いたいのかまったくわからない。
[ショコラ]: 「あ、時雨ちゃんだー！　久しぶりー♪　元気にしてたー！？」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、何その格好？　流行ってるの？」
[時雨？]: 「あ、こら！　ワシは時雨ちゃんではなっ……！」
[時雨？]: 「あっ、ちょ、外套を引っ張るでな……あっ、あ……ちょ！」
reference_answer:
[Shigure?]: 「When it comes to business, you won't get anywhere if you don't jump at every opportunity to make money!」
[Shigure?]: 「Besides, to see Nii-sama give me such a cold look is making me sad! I'm sad!」
[Shigure?]: 「And after I held back until today to do something to help you too...! Uuuu...!!」
[Kashou]: 「Look, I'm not being picky here...」
Not only had she now burst into tears, but her façade was in shambles.
I had no clue what to say.
[Chocola]: 「Ah, Shigure-chan~! It's been a while~ ♪ How have you been~?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure, what's with that outfit? Is that what people are wearing now?」
[Shigure?]: 「Y-You're mistaken! I am not this Shigure-chan you speak of...!」
[Shigure?]: 「Ah, stop! Don't pull on my cloak... ahh, ah... wait.」
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "Business is about earning as much as possible when you can, even if it means being ruthless!"
Shigure: "And I'm sad to be looked at with such cold eyes by my brother! It really hurts me."
Shigure: "I endured everything until today hoping that somehow I could still contribute something... Waaah!!"
Kashou: "So, don’t go picking and choosing..."
The crying has started again on top of the inconsistent character portrayal. 
It's impossible to understand what she wants now.
Chocola: "Oh, it's Shigure-chan! Long time no see~ Are you doing well?"
Vanilla: "Shigure, what is that outfit? Is it trendy or something?"
Shigure: "Hey, wait a minute! I am not 'Shigure-chan', okay..."
Shigure: "Ah, oh... someone's pulling my outer garment now. Ah, ah, no!"

Question:
[アズキ]: 「よー。数日ぶりだな、ショコラ、バニラ」
[メイプル]: 「あら、それが制服？　可愛いじゃない、馬子にも衣装って感じで」
[シナモン]: 「ショコラちゃんもバニラちゃんも元気そうで良かったぁ」
[シナモン]: 「急にいなくなっちゃうから心配したんだよー？」
[ココナツ]: 「そうだよ、すごくすごく心配したんだよ？」
[ココナツ]: 「嘉祥様に付いてくなら一言言ってくれれば良かったのに」
[ショコラ]: 「あはは、ごめんね？　ついつい勢いでのことだったから」
[バニラ]: 「また会えたから問題ない。みんな元気そうで何より」
[時雨]: 「うんうん。ネコたちも感動の再会を喜んでいるようで何よりですね」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Yo. It's been a few days, Chocola, Vanilla.」
[Maple]: 「Oh, are those your uniforms? Aren't they cute~ Talk about dressing to suit your body type!」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm glad that you two are doing well.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I got worried when you two suddenly disappeared, you know~?」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah, we were really, really worried!」
[Coconut]: 「You should've just told us you were going with Kashou-sama.」
[Chocola]: 「Ahaha, sorry! It was kind of a spur-of-the-moment thing.」
[Vanilla]: 「If we can see each other again, then it's not a problem. I'm glad that everyone is doing well.」
[Shigure]: 「Mmhmm! Seeing the catgirls having a happy, emotional reunion together is simply the best!」
ModelAnswer:
Azuki: "Yo. It's been a few days, Chocola, Vanilla."
Maple: "Oh my, is that a uniform? How cute! Like dressing up even for the most humble of creatures."
Cinnamon: "It's good to see you both doing well!"
Cinnamon: "I was worried when you suddenly disappeared?"
Coconut: "Yes, I really, really was worried?"
Coconut: "If you were going with Kashou-sama, it would have been nice if you had said something."
Chocola: "Ahaha, sorry? It just happened so quickly without thinking about anything else."
Vanilla: "It's okay since we can meet again. I am glad to see everyone is doing well above all else."
Shigure: "Yes yes. The cats seem overjoyed at this emotional reunion as well."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「シナモンもココナツも、余計な心配掛けてすまなかったな」
[嘉祥]: 「もう今後はこんなことしないから勘弁してくれ」
シナモンとココナツにも頭を下げる。
こうやって実家のネコが全員来てくれて。
今は本当に家族の暖かみがありがたく思える。
[時雨]: 「お父さまの耳には入らないようにしておきますので、ご安心下さい」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。お前には色々と気苦労掛けてすまないな」
[時雨]: 「そんなことは何も」
[時雨]: 「私はいつでも兄さまを見て来ましたし、これからも応援していますから」
小さな両手で俺の手をそっと包んでくれる。
黙って出て行ったことなど一言も口にしないまま。
ただ許してくれるように。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon, Coconut, I'm sorry to have worried you guys, too.」
[Kashou]: 「It won't happen again, so please cut me some slack.」
I lowered my head towards Cinnamon and Coconut.
And just like that, all the catgirls in my family were assembled.
I appreciated the warmth of having my family here right now.
[Shigure]: 「I won't let Father know about this, so please don't worry.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, I appreciate it. You've been through a lot, too. Sorry.」
[Shigure]: 「It was nothing.」
[Shigure]: 「I will always come and visit you, Nii-sama. I'll be cheering you on.」
She wrapped her small hands around my hand.
She didn't say anything about me slipping out without telling anyone.
She simply just forgave me.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "I apologize to Cinnamon and Coconut for causing you unnecessary worry."
Kashou: "Please forgive me, I won't do this again in the future."
Cinnamon and Coconut also lower their heads. 
With all of my family cats now here...
Now more than ever, I feel grateful for our familial warmth.
Shigure: "I will make sure your father doesn’t hear about it, so rest assured.”
Kashou: “Ah, thank you. Sorry to bother you with these things." 
Shigure: "It's nothing at all."
Shigure: "I have always been watching over my brother and I will continue supporting him from now on as well."
She gently wraps her small hands around mine.
Without uttering a single word about leaving silently...
Just offering forgiveness, it seems.

metadata:

Question:
時雨が興味深そうに回転台やローラー類、分割器などの器具を見て回る。
もちろん同じものもたくさんあるけども細かいところは違うものが多い。
[時雨]: 「兄さまはこちらでケーキをお作りになるのですね」
[時雨]: 「和装の兄さまも垂涎モノでしたが、パティシエバージョンも女心にきゅんきゅん来るものがあります」
[時雨]: 「ああっ……！　許されることであればライブカメラを設置して、兄さまのお姿を２４時間愛でられるようにしたい……！」
[嘉祥]: 「もちろん許されないからなそれ」
そもそも２４時間ここにいるわけじゃないし。
相変わらず際どい発言をする我が妹だ。
[時雨]: 「でもショコラもバニラも元気そうで安心しました」
reference_answer:
Shigure seemed really intrigued as she looked around at the mixers, rollers, and other tools in the kitchen.
There was a lot of similar equipment, of course, but there were minute differences.
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, this is where you make cakes, isn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「I prefer seeing Nii-sama in traditional Japanese clothing, but I'm sure you in your bakery uniform will make girls' hearts sing, too.」
[Shigure]: 「Ahh...! If I could, I would install a live camera so I could watch my beloved Nii-sama 24/7...!」
[Kashou]: 「There's no way I'd be okay with that.」
Not that there was any way I'd be there baking for 24 hours straight.
As usual, my little sister said some pretty questionable things.
[Shigure]: 「... But I am glad that both Chocola and Vanilla are doing well.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure looks around with interest at the turntables, rollers, dividers and other equipment. 
There are many of the same items as well but there's quite a few differences in detail too.
SHIGURE: "Master makes cake here then?"
SHIGURE: "Seeing you dressed traditionally was tantalizing enough, Master, but this patissier version also has me feeling doki doki." 
SHIGURE: "Ahh... If I were allowed to set up a live camera so that I could admire your appearance for 24 hours straight..."
KASHOU: "Of course you're not permitted to do any of that."
I don’t even spend all day here, after all.
As always my sister makes daring statements like this one.
SHIGURE: "But seeing Chocola and Vanilla doing well puts me at ease too."

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「でもお店で働かせるのなら、ちゃんと資格を取らせないとですね」
[嘉祥]: 「資格？　調理師免許ってことか？」
[時雨]: 「くすくす。違いますよ、兄さま。そうではなくてですね？」
[時雨]: 「ネコを単独行動させたり従業員として扱うには……」
[時雨]: 「対象のネコに単独行動許可証という資格が必要なのです」
[時雨]: 「許可証なく外を歩いたりしたらば、ネコは警察に補導されてしまいますから」
[時雨]: 「それに許可証なく従業員としては使えません」
[時雨]: 「無料のお手伝い程度ならまた別の話なのですが」
[嘉祥]: 「許可証って……家のネコたちだって、外に出る時にそんなの持ってなかっただろ？」
家のネコたちが時雨の使いで外出する時のことを思い出してみる。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「But if you're going to get them working in this bakery, certain qualifications are necessary.」
[Kashou]: 「Qualifications? Are you talking about a cooking certification?」
[Shigure]: 「Teehee~ Not that, Nii-sama. It isn't that...」
[Shigure]: 「Regarding, allowing catgirls to work independently as employees...」
[Shigure]: 「A catgirl needs to have an "Independent Action Permit" in terms of qualifications.」
[Shigure]: 「Without that permit, a catgirl can be arrested by the police if they are out and about.」
[Shigure]: 「Besides, they can't be employed without that permit.」
[Shigure]: 「Working for free is a different story, though.」
[Kashou]: 「A permit... but our family's catgirls have never had one of those when they leave home, right?」
I tried to remember the times when our family's catgirls went out while under Shigure's watch.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "But if you're going to have me work at the shop, I should properly obtain a license."
Kashou: "A license? You mean like a chef's license?"
Shigure: "Hehe. No, Master. It isn’t quite that kind of thing?"
Shigure: "To allow cats independent action or treat them as employees..."
Shigure: "The cat in question needs to have an Independent Action Permit."
Shigure: "If a cat were caught walking outside without one, they would be apprehended by the police."
Shigure: "And you can’t use it as staff either if there isn't any permit."
Shigure: "It is another story for simple volunteer help though."
Kashou: "An Independent Action Permit... Even our house cats didn't have one of those when they went out on errands, did they?"

I remember the times my household cats left at Shigure’s behest.

metadata:

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「どうですどうですー？　ご主人さまも嬉しいですかー？」
[バニラ]: 「時雨の兄想いな心にはほんと頭が下がるね」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨えぇえぇええぇぇぇぇぇえぇぇぇえぇーーーーーー！！！！」
色々と新品なものをまさか捨てるわけにもいかず。
こうして俺もファンシーな姫roomで生活する羽目になった。
……でも意外に寝心地は最高で文句なかった。
[ショコラ]: 「ありがとうございましたー♪　またのご来店をお待ちしておりまーす！」
[ショコラ]: 「いらっしゃいませ！　メニューはこちらになりまして、オススメはこちらの看板でーす♪」
[バニラ]: 「お待たせしました。季節のミルフィーユとチョコモンブランになります」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「What do you think, what do you think~? Are you happy, Master~?」
[Vanilla]: 「I really must take my hat off to how much Shigure loves you.」
[Kashou]: 「Shigureeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!」
There was no way I could just throw out all the new things in the room.
And so, I became burdened with a glorious fantasy princess room.
... But surprisingly, I slept extremely well, so I didn't complain.
[Chocola]: 「Thank you very much~ ♪ We look forward to seeing you again soon!」
[Chocola]: 「Welcome! The menu is right over there and specials are listed on this sign here! ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Thank you for waiting. Here is your seasonal mille-feuille and chocolate montblanc.」
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "How is it, how is it? Are you happy too, Master?"
Vanilla: "I really admire Shigure's devotion."
Kashou: "Shigure eeeeeeeeee!?"
There were many new things that I couldn’t possibly throw away. 
Thus, I ended up living in a fancy princess room as well.
...But the comfort was surprisingly good and there wasn't anything to complain about.
Chocola: "Thank you very much! We look forward to your next visit!"
Chocola: "Welcome! Here is our menu, and we recommend this signpost here."
Vanilla: "Here are your seasonal mille-feuille and chocolate mont blanc."

... It seemed that selling out and closing early on opening day actually got us noticed.

I decide not to pursue it further. 
Shigure also laughs softly and tilts her head in response.
If she were going to answer honestly, she would have said so directly after all.
That sort of thing is typical Shigure from way back when.
Shigure: "I understand what you mean, brother."
Shigure: "But cats are smart creatures. They can become family or partners with humans as well."
Shigure: "……that's why"
She pauses for a moment there. 
Then she looks at me while wearing an awkward smile on her face.
Shigure: "……I think it must be lonely to not even have someone rely on you, right?"
That smiling expression causes pain in my chest.

携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。

reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
She frowned, looking at her phone's screen. 
Realizing the caller ID without moving from where she was standing.
Kashou: "It must be home? You should go quickly."
Shigure: "...I already know what it is even if I don’t have a reason to answer. They didn't tell me their destination before leaving." 
The phone in Shigure's hand stops ringing.
Similarly, she remains silent and squeezes her cell tightly.
Shigure: "...Is this because I am still too young?"
Shigure: "Or perhaps it’s due to my naivety as a child?"
Shigure: "...So that is why I must follow what Father and Mother say?" 
Shigure: "...I want to stay here."
Shigure: "At least when Brother-sama suffers...at the very least, allow me to be by his side..."

reference_answer:

We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.

[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」

ModelAnswer:

They clasp hands tightly in anxiety.

つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
From the very beginning, an unexpected sight made my head spin.
Shigure: "Good morning, brother."
Shigure: "I've been thinking about this situation quite a bit."
A bright and cloudless smile. 
The other cats are smiling at me in similar fashion as well.
As I feel the cold sweat trickling down my back,
Kashou: "Haa... What exactly have you thought up?"
Somehow managing to utter only that much.
Shigure: "After everything this time around, it became clear how impossible asking brother not to overwork himself was." 
Shigure: "But I'm also a little concerned about the sleepless nights worrying me as your sister..."
Shigure: "Therefore, increasing manpower and lessening brother’s burden seems like the best course of action. That is what Shigure has decided upon.”
Kashou: “…………Haa”

[Awayuki]: 「My, oh my, this is wonderful! Are you sure? Are you positive? Thank you, Shigure!」
ModelAnswer:
Cinnamon: "Haa... Cooking is good, but this tea... what a lovely scent. A sparkling flavor, truly worthy of Maple-chan's choice!"
Maple: "A strongly scented leaf suits the party well. Today it’s champagne flavored."
Maple: "With a glass teapot you can enjoy watching flower petals in the leaves dance around as they steep."
Cinnamon: "Amazing! Amazing, Maple-chan! Cinnamon is getting all worked up... doki doki!"
Shigure: "Mother, once again - happy birthday." Saying this, Shigure took out a wrapped small box.
Awayuki: "Oh my, what's that?"
Shigure: "A picture frame. You mentioned wanting a larger one before."
Awayuki: "My goodness, how lovely! Is it alright? Oh dear, is it alright? Thank you so much, Shigure!"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「昔から、嘉祥は１つのことに夢中になると、他のことを忘れてしまうんだから」
[嘉祥]: 「返す言葉もない」
[淡雪]: 「いいのよ、嘉祥はケーキ屋さんなんだから。ケーキが一番のプレゼントだわ」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってもらえると……。でも、近いうちに持ってくるよ」
[淡雪]: 「そう？　楽しみにしているわ」
[時雨]: 「それでは、ちょっと予定と違いますが、ケーキを出しましょうか」
[ショコラ]: 「わーい！　ご主人さまのケーキにゃ！」
[ココナツ]: 「ケーキ！　ぼ、ぼく、持ってくるよ！！」
[バニラ]: 「待った、ココナツ。落ちついて。ステイ」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「You've always been the type to forget about everything else when you get focused on one thing, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know what to say.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, it's fine. You're a cake baker, Kashou. A cake is the best present I could ask for.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm glad to hear you say that... Still, I'll bring you a proper present sometime soon.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, really? Then, I look forward to it.」
[Shigure]: 「Well then, it deviates from my plans slightly, but why don't we bring out the cake now?」
[Chocola]: 「Yay! It's time for Master's cake, nya!」
[Coconut]: 「Cake! I-I volunteer to bring it out!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hold it, Coconut. Down, girl. Stay.」
ModelAnswer:
Awayuki: "From long ago, Kashou would become absorbed in one thing and forget everything else."
Kashou: "I have no response to that."
Awayuki: "It's alright. Since Kashou is a cake shop owner after all, the best present will always be cakes."
Kashou: "Hearing you say that makes me feel better... But I promise to bring one soon."
Awayuki: "Really? Then I look forward to it."
Shigure: "Well then, although slightly different from our original plans, shall we serve the cake?"
Chocola: "Yay! Master's cake nya!"
Coconut: "Cake! B-but, I will bring one too!!"
Vanilla: "Hold on, Coconut. Calm down. Stay."

Question:
お客さんからお褒めの言葉をもらうことはあるが、母親から言われると妙に照れてしまう。
ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。
[ショコラ]: 「ステキですにゃ、ご主人さま～！」
[バニラ]: 「良い」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、アタシは手伝ったから、完成品を見てっけどな」
[メイプル]: 「気合い入ってるわね」
[シナモン]: 「お、おいしそう～……じゅるり」
[ココナツ]: 「すごい……かわいい。食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいだよ！」
[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
Sometimes I receive praise from customers, but when my mother says something nice it makes me strangely embarrassed. 
The cats were also sparkling with excitement in their eyes.
Chocola: "It's wonderful, Master!"
Vanilla: "Good."
Azuki: "Well, since I helped out a bit, I guess I can see the finished product now."
Maple: "You really put your heart into this one."
Cinnamon: "Ooh... looks delicious~... slurps"
Coconut: "Amazing... so cute. It's almost too bad to eat!"
Awayuki: "Really? Cutting it up feels like a waste, doesn’t it?"
Awayuki: "I could display it in the room forever."
Shigure: "I understand perfectly, Mother!"
Awayuki: "See?"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。仕方ありません、やってください、メイプル」
[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」
[淡雪]: 「あら、この開け方は、お父さまねぇ。今日は早く帰ってきたみたい」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "If you leave it like that, we won't be able to eat any of it... so I guess I should cut into it?"
Shigure: "Yes. There isn’t anything else for me to do but let you go ahead and slice away at the cake, Maple."
Maple: "Saku saku saku..." 
Maple swiftly inserts a knife into the cake, quickly cutting slices of it apart.
Awayuki: "Oh my—"
Awayuki: "It seems like even our cats have become quite adept with knives as well! They handle them almost professionally.”
Shigure: “They’ve been working at the shop for some time now so they are pros already, Mother." 
Awayuki: "Ah yes, that's right! Hehe... how dependable of you both!"
Just when all slices had finished being cut—
The sound of a door opening comes from near the entrance.
Shigure: “Huh!?”
Awayuki: "Oh my goodness… That way they open doors is quite familiar to me, it must be Father who has come home earlier than usual."

Question:
俺は緊張して身を固くする。
ネコたちも息を呑んだ。
[州浜]: 「…………ふん」
この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I tense up, stiffening my body. 
The cats also hold their breath.
Minaduki Suhama-san: "…………humph"
This man is my father—Minaduki Shigure's and Cinnamon-chan’s dad, Minaduki Suhama.
Minaduki Shigure-san: "Um, Father… wasn't tonight supposed to be the Chamber of Commerce meeting?"
Minaduki Shugaru-san: “That may be so... but is my return inconvenient in any way?”
Minaduki Shigure-san: "N-no such thing..."
Chocola-chan: "Excuse me! Master's father, welcome home!" 
Vanilla-chan: "Master’s dad, an unexpectedly early homecoming."
Coconut-chan: “O-oh Father, you are back!”
Minaduki Shugaru-san: "Hm"
Maple-chan: "... This is going to be bad, isn't it?"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「嬉しかったわよ。こんな賑やかなのは久しぶりだもの」
[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
Awayuki-san: "I'm glad. It has been a long time since I experienced such liveliness."
Awayuki-san: "Father, why don’t you sit down? Kashou's cake looks delicious, doesn't it?"
Shigure-san: "Ah, yes! Father, today is the day to finally try your brother's cake!"
Shigure-san: "If you eat it, I am sure that you will understand how seriously he has been working on this."
I couldn’t help but hold my breath. Would father actually taste a cake made by me? 
What would he say?
Chocola-chan: "I agree! If everyone eats Master's delicious cake, we can all get along better!"
Vanilla-san: "No doubt about it."
Coconut-chan: "Mm-hmm! My brother’s cake is really tasty after all!”

父親が部屋を出て行った。

reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「You mean that isn't it...?!」
[Suhama]: 「Sigh... Seems that telling you isn't enough for you to understand.」
[Suhama]: 「Just wait here.」
Dad leaves the room.
[Kashou]: 「What's he trying to prove?」

ModelAnswer:

Suhama: "Haa... It seems you don't understand even when I say it."
Suhama: "You should wait for a while longer."
Father left the room.
Kashou: "What was all of that..."
Shigure: "I am sorry, brother, mother... Because of me, this birthday party we had planned so carefully has become ruined."
Kashou: "Shigure is not at fault here. As I said earlier, it's my decision to return today."
Awayuki: "That’s right! It feels like the old days when things were lively and fun.”

Awayuki: "Hehe... Kashou and Father are always in this mood anyway."

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
俺は、それだけを告げると、水無月の家から出ていた。まるで逃げるように。
いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。
気がつけば、俺は夜の公園にいた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。
[嘉祥]: 「……なにやってるんだ、俺は」
[ショコラ]: 「……ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ……！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物」
バニラの手には、俺の鞄があった。
[嘉祥]: 「持ってきてくれたのか、バニラ」
[バニラ]: 「当然のこと。野宿は困る」
[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I simply stated that and left Minaduki's house, almost as if fleeing. 
Various thoughts raced through my mind, making it difficult to think straight.
Before I knew it, I found myself in a night park.
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah..."
I had put all the keys and wallet into my bag but left them behind at his house.
Minaduki Kashou: "...What am I doing?"
Chocola: "...Master"
Minaduki Kashou: "Chocola!"
Vanilla: "Master, you forgot something."
In Vanilla's hand was the bag that contained all my belongings. 
Minaduki Kashou: "You brought it for me, Vanilla?"
Vanilla: "Of course I did. It would be troublesome to sleep outside."
Minaduki Kashou: "That is true."
Without those keys, not only could I not enter the house but neither of them two either.

metadata:

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ショコラたちは大丈夫です！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまは、大丈夫ですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ……もちろん」
[嘉祥]: 「……いや……どうかな？」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物を持ってきたご褒美はある？」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ？　何か欲しいのか？」
[バニラ]: 「あそこに自販機がある。温かい飲み物を買ってくる。今夜は冷える」
[嘉祥]: 「……わかった」
ご褒美と言ったが……バニラは、俺のために温かい飲み物を買ってきてくれるのだろう。
いつの間にか、ずいぶんと身体が冷えていた。
[バニラ]: 「どうぞ、ご主人」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうな、バニラ」
俺は買ってきてもらった缶コーヒーを受け取った。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「Chocola and Vanilla are fine!」
[Chocola]: 「But are you okay, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah... Of course.」
[Kashou]: 「...Actually... I'm not sure.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, do I get a reward for retrieving your bag?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Did you want something?」
[Vanilla]: 「There is a vending machine over there. I'll buy some warm drinks. Tonight is chilly.」

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I had something I wanted to ask my suppliers about. It wasn't urgent, but it would be best if I called them sooner rather than later. 
It might seem normal for a small patisserie owner like me, but I negotiate directly with each supplier myself.
There are also farms that will sell ingredients not generally available in stores when you buy large quantities from them.
The pursuit of flavor was itself an adventure to find the right materials.
Since everyone else seemed excited about sightseeing at this time, it would be rude for me to discuss work matters here; I excused myself by saying I had personal business and left my room. 
Just in case, I also stepped out from the inn so that I could speak somewhere quiet instead of inside.
I made a phone call.
Kashou: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?" 
Kashou: "Fuu..."
The person on the other end was surprised to hear about an international order but they seem willing enough to ship it over eventually.
I return inside my room at the inn.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Let's try one."
I bought a hot spring manju from the stall. 
It was freshly made and piping hot.
Taking a bite, it had a soft texture that wasn’t quite what I expected; more moist than anticipated.
The bean paste crumbled on my tongue as sweetness spread throughout my mouth.
Kashou: "I see... hoh hoh... This is delicious."
Neither the Western sweets I make nor our family's traditional Japanese confections are served warm like this. 
It was quite an interesting experience, enjoying a piping hot manju while saying 'hoh hoh'.
Kashou: "Speaking of which, though I’ve come to onsen towns several times before... I don't think I ever had one."
That must be because there weren't any cats around then. 
Even when my parents, Shigure and I traveled together as a family of four, we never talked about buying snacks like this along the way.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」

[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Oh, you were here, Shigure. Were you busy?"
Shigure: "No, I'm alright now."
Kashou: "Was that a work call for you too, perhaps?"
Shigure: "...Yes. Sorry about this during our trip..."
Kashou: "There is no need to apologize. La Soleil has its day off today but it’s still the weekday in general.”

I haven't heard much detail on her business matters, though Shigure seems to run a company of some sort. 
She uses that income for things like buying clothes for cats and letting bell-holders take entrance exams.
Her father is strict towards me but lenient with his daughter, Shigure; he appears to allow both the cat activities as well as her business ventures without restrictions.
Kashou: "The cats were enjoying themselves in their own ways - ping pong, video games... even at the shop.”

[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」

Sounds like a plan, then.

Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "That's good. ... Kashou-sama, sometimes I wish we could hang out just the two of us."
Kashou: "Sure, what do you want to do?"
Shigure: "I heard there was a karaoke room somewhere around here?"
Kashou: "Karaoke... haven’t done that since high school. Shigure, can you sing?"
Shigure: "When I was little, I used to participate in choir, so maybe just a bit."

That's how it came about. 
Shigure: "Then, with all my feelings for Kashou-sama... "
As she began singing, the atmosphere changed completely.
Shigure: "~~~~~♪"
Kashou: "... Incredible."
Shigure: "Haa~, I haven't sung this loudly in a long time."
Kashou: "Seriously amazing!"

Honestly, it was on par with professional quality. I gave her enthusiastic applause.

Yeah, I don't think I can get to sleep.
I exit the room, careful not to make a sound on the way out.
The inn has its lamps on at night, but once I leave the area, I'm greeted by rural darkness.
Depending on the spot, it's dark enough that I can't even tell where it is I'm standing.
This hot spring district is usually bustling with tourists during the day, but in the wee hours of the night, it has a completely different atmosphere.
I peer down from the bridge.
Darkness.
All I can hear is the sound of the running river.
I feel I can make out the moon's reflection on the water's surface... No, wait, is that just a street light?
I peer deeper below the bridge to confirm.

Shigure: "Su... su..."
I still couldn't fall asleep.
Carefully avoiding making any noise, I left the room.
The inn had a night light but once away from it, you were in the countryside at night. 
In some places there was darkness so thick that one could not even see their own feet.
Even this hot spring town bustling with tourists during the day felt completely different late at night.
I looked down from the bridge.
Darkness.
Only the sound of flowing water filled my ears.
It almost seemed like I saw moonlight reflecting on the surface... no, was that just light from a street lamp? 
To confirm this, I leaned over and peered under the bridge.

[アズキ]: 「嘉祥の今までのことって？」
[嘉祥]: 「……大学卒業後に、俺はフランス留学をした」

reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Because you didn't put on outside shoes. That's not normal for a walk this late at night, don't you think?」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "I apologize... I really just wanted a change of pace."
Azuki: "Is your worry still about the convenience store sweets?"
Kashou: "No no, that is alright now for sure."
Kashou: "But remembering things from before makes me wonder what exactly it is I lack..."
Azuki: "What do you mean by 'things from before'?"
Kashou: "...After graduating university, I studied abroad in France."
Kashou: "I graduated and didn’t have any other options but to take over the family business. It just wasn't satisfying for me; I wanted a broader perspective on things.”
Kashou: “Don't misunderstand though... it isn’t that I dislike Minaduki sweets, okay?"

[Kashou]: 「That only my cakes have...」

[Kashou]: 「But there's still something I'm hung up on.」

[Kashou]: 「My dad always speaks with a purpose—especially when it comes to cuisine.」

Kashou: "There's no way the old man would ever speak carelessly about food, though.”

Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "In France, eating cake during meals is quite common."
Kashou: "Even in ordinary households, dinner might be served like this—salad, soup, bread, fish dishes, meat dishes, cheese, dessert..." 
The number of plates varies by household.
Shigure: "Every day feels like French cuisine."
Kashou: "That's why it isn’t unusual for people to eat cake almost every day.”
Shigure: “Hmm… I see…”
Shigure: “It seems strange somehow, having a course meal at home.”
Kashou: "No no... typical Japanese family meals would look like kaiseki cuisine from the perspective of someone in another country." 
Kashou: "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat and fish… there isn't much difference in how many plates are used, right?"
Shigure: “Now that you mention it…”

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そいつはよかった」
[時雨]: 「時雨は……彼を心から愛していますと」
[嘉祥]: 「それは誤解されるんじゃないか！？」
[時雨]: 「嘘は言っていません」
[嘉祥]: 「……嘘は言っていないのかもしれないけどなぁ……！」
[ベニエ]: 「おやおや……もしかして、嘉祥は時雨のことが嫌いなの？」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そんなことありませんよ！」
[ベニエ]: 「なら、仲良くするくらい、普通のことじゃなくて？　家族だもの」
[時雨]: 「ベニエさん！　さすがです！」
[嘉祥]: 「うぐ……」
たしかに、日本人に比べると、フランスの人たちは、家族仲がいいようだ。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「That's a relief.」
[Shigure]: 「I told her... 'I love him from the bottom of my heart'.」
[Kashou]: 「That's just gonna give her the wrong idea!」
[Shigure]: 「I did not tell a lie.」
[Kashou]: 「...I mean, you technically didn't tell a lie, but still...!」
[Beignet]: 「My, oh my... Could it be that you dislike Shigure?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? That isn't what I mean!」
[Beignet]: 「Then, isn't playing nice with her normal? You're family, after all.」
[Shigure]: 「Beignet-san, right as always!」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
Well, the French do have more intimate family relationships in comparison to the Japanese.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "That's good."
Shigure: "I... I truly love him, you know?"
Kashou: "Is that going to be misunderstood!?"
Shigure: "I am not lying."
Kashou: "... Maybe you aren’t telling a lie after all..."
Beignet: "Oh my oh my… Perhaps Kashou dislikes Shigure then?”
Kashou: “Huh? That's absolutely untrue!"
Beignet: "Then, isn't it normal to get along well with each other? You are family."
Shigure: "Beignet-san! As expected of you!”
Kashou: "Ugh..."

Indeed, compared to Japanese people, French families seem very close.

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「え？」
[嘉祥]: 「ひとつひとつの仕事は丁寧だから、ミスがない。それでいて、ずっと動き続けているから、相当な仕事量をこなしている」
[嘉祥]: 「この店は、君がいないと回らないだろうね」
[フレーズ]: 「そんなことは……」
[ベニエ]: 「そのとおりよ。最近は、お客さんが増えて、もう私だけでは無理ね」
[フレーズ]: 「……今日は、とくにお客さんが多いです」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ……いつもなら、ティータイムが取れるくらい空いているような時間帯なのだけれど」
行列ができるほどではないが、ひっきりなしにお客さんが訪れていた。
彼らの目当ては、おそらく時雨だろう。
[嘉祥]: 「ＳＮＳで拡散したせいかな」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Huh?」
[Kashou]: 「You're careful and deliberate so you don't make mistakes, and despite being so particular, you're constantly on the move, so you get a considerable amount done.」
[Kashou]: 「This shop probably wouldn't operate without you around, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「Oh, I don't think...」
[Beignet]: 「That's right. With all the new customers as of late, I can't keep up anymore.」
[Fraise]: 「...Today was particularly packed.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Normally, it's usually slow enough around this time of the day to have afternoon tea.」
It wasn't enough to form any lines, but the customers didn't let up for a second.
They're all probably here for Shigure.
[Kashou]: 「I'm guessing it's because of the spread on social media.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "Eh?"
Kashou: "Each task is done meticulously, so there are no mistakes. And yet she continues to work tirelessly, handling a substantial amount of labor."
Kashou: "This shop wouldn't function without you, would it?"
Fraise: "That isn’t…"
Beignet: "Exactly as he says. Lately we have more customers than I can handle on my own.”
Fraise: “Today… there are especially a lot of people."
Beignet: "Yes... usually this time of day is quiet enough for me to enjoy tea, you see?"

A line wasn't forming yet, but the shop was constantly visited by patrons. 
They were likely here seeking Shigure.
Kashou: “Perhaps it’s because she shared on social media?”

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「謝らないで。わたしは、お客さんが多いほうが嬉しいです」
口調や雰囲気は違うが、ちょっと師匠みたいなことを言う。師匠が娘のように思って育てているのだから、当然か。
[時雨]: 「なんて、よく出来た子なんでしょう！」
[嘉祥]: 「優秀だな、フレーズは。うちのショコラと、そう変わらない歳のはずなのに」
[時雨]: 「フランスの鈴持ち試験は、相当に厳しいらしいですから。それに合格しているだけでも、間違いなく優秀ですね」
[嘉祥]: 「え、試験内容が違うのか？」
[時雨]: 「もちろんです。自動車の免許試験と同じで、国ごとに基準がぜんぜん違います」
[時雨]: 「しかも、日本だと国から業務委託された民間企業の方々が試験官なんですが、フランスは警察官が担当していますから」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Don't apologize. I like it when there are more customers around.」
The tone and demeanor aren't quite the same, but she's starting to speak a little like Mentor. I suppose it comes with the territory since Mentor raised her like a daughter.
[Shigure]: 「You are such a well-behaved girl!」
[Kashou]: 「Fraise sure is qualified. She should be the same age as Chocola, too.」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard that the French Bell-Holder Exam is considerably harder. One must be undoubtedly qualified just to pass.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Is the exam different content-wise?」
[Shigure]: 「Of course. It's the same as a driver's license exam, where the standard is completely different from country to country.」
[Shigure]: 「Plus, in Japan, private-sector people outsourced by the government serve as proctors, but in France, police officers take on that role.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "Don't apologize. I like it when we have many customers."
Though her tone and atmosphere are different, she says something similar to what a teacher would say. It is natural since Master has raised her as if she were his own daughter.
Shigure: "What an excellent child!"
Kashou: "Fraise is quite capable. She's about the same age as our Chocola."
Shigure: "The French bell-bearing test seems to be extremely strict, though. Passing it alone certainly means she’s talented.”
Kashou: “Huh? Is there a difference in what they test?”
Shigure: "Of course. Just like driving tests differ by country; the standards are completely different."
Shigure: "Furthermore, here in Japan private companies contracted to do work for the government act as examiners but in France police officers handle it.”

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「鈴の試験……はい……大変でした」
[フレーズ]: 「無理だと思ったことも、何度か……でも、パティシエールが、いっぱい教えてくれましたから」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……本人の努力がなければ、私が何を言っても無意味よ？」
[ベニエ]: 「フレーズが鈴を持っているのは、フレーズが努力をしたから」
[フレーズ]: 「ありがとうございます、パティシエール」
[時雨]: 「ふわぁぁぁ……つ、連れて帰りたい！」
[嘉祥]: 「おいおい、本気っぽく言うな」
[ベニエ]: 「……いいかもしれないわね」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ！？」
[ベニエ]: 「フレーズは、物心ついたときには、私の家にいて……この店、この街しか知らないわ」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「The Bell exam was... yes, very tough.」
[Fraise]: 「There were many times where I thought I wasn't cut out... but Pâtissière was so kind to teach me so much.」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... There'd be no point in teaching you if you didn't have the effort to back it up.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why you have a bell, Fraise, is because you put forth the effort.」
[Fraise]: 「Thank you very much, Pâtissière.」
[Shigure]: 「Fwaaaah... I-I want to take you home!」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, hey. Don't go saying that like you mean it!」
[Beignet]: 「...That might be a good idea.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?!」
[Beignet]: 「Fraise has been in my house before she could even walk or talk... She only knows this shop and this town.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "The bell exam... yes, it was quite difficult."
Fraise: "I thought I couldn't do it several times... but the patissiere taught me so much."
Beignet: "Hehe... without your own efforts, anything I say would be meaningless?"
Beignet: "That Fraise has a bell is because Fraise put in effort."
Fraise: "Thank you, Patissiere."
Shigure: "Fuwaaa... oh, I want to take her home!"
Kashou: "Hey now, don't say that so seriously."
Beignet: "... Maybe it wouldn’t be bad."
Kashou: "Huh!?"
Beignet: "Fraise has been living in my house since she was very young... and only knows this shop, or this town.”

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「…………えっ？」
[ベニエ]: 「貴女も、いろいろなことへ目を向けたほうがいいと思うの。小さな画面を通してではなく」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ございません……私は、兄様がいない世界では、生きていけないのです」
[時雨]: 「水と空気と兄様が必要です」
[ベニエ]: 「そうなの？　残念だわ」
[時雨]: 「ふぅ……さすがは、兄様の師匠様……ベニエさんのほうが上手ですね」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠がどこまで本気なのか、わからないけれど……フレーズが広く世界を知ったほうがいいというのは、俺も賛成だ」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、急がなくても……そうしたいと願うときがきたら……俺もできるかぎり協力させてもらうよ、フレーズ」
[フレーズ]: 「……ありがとうございます。いつか、そのときには、ぜひ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「...Huh?」
[Beignet]: 「I think it'd be best for you to look at what the world has to offer, as well. In person and not through a small screen.」
[Shigure]: 「You must forgive me... I cannot live in a world without Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I need three things: water, air, and Nii-sama.」
[Beignet]: 「Is that so? What a shame.」
[Shigure]: 「Phew... As expected of Nii-sama's mentor... Beignet-san makes better arguments.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure how much of that was true, but... I also agree that Fraise should learn more about the world.」
[Kashou]: 「But, it doesn't have to be right away. Whenever the time comes where you want to do that, I'll do everything in my power to help you, Fraise.」
[Fraise]: 「...Thank you very much. When that time does come, I would appreciate it.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "…………Huh?"
Beignet: "I think you should look at a lot of things, not just through small screens."
Shigure: "I apologize... I can't live in this world without my older brother."
Shigure: "Water and air are essential to me as well. And so is my big brother.”
Beignet: “Is that right? That’s a shame.” 
Shigure: "Haa… As expected, Master’s mentor... Beignet-san has more skill than I do."
Kashou: "I don't know how serious Mentor really is, but I agree with the idea of Fraise seeing more of this world.”
Kashou: “But there’s no need to rush… When you feel like it, then we can work together as much as possible. Fraise." 
Fraise: "……Thank you very much. Perhaps someday when that time comes, I will definitely take your offer up.”

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うん。さてと……皿を洗うとするかな」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……私も厨房に戻るわね」
気がつけば、フランスに来ての１日目が終わろうとしていた。
本家ラ・ソレイユは日没前には、フェルメ――営業終了となる。
[ベニエ]: 「２人とも、お疲れさまでした。たっぷり食べてちょうだい」
[時雨]: 「わぁ、ありがとうございます！」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます。俺だけでも、急にお願いしたのに……そのうえ、時雨まで」
[ベニエ]: 「食事は大勢のほうが楽しいもの。それに、あなたたちは家族じゃないの」
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[ベニエ]: 「さあ、どうぞ」
[一同]: 「いただきますいただきます」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yep. Now then... Time to wash up the plates.」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I'll be heading back to the kitchen, then.」
Before I even notice, my first full day in France is coming to a close.
The original La Soleil is fermée— closed for business—before sunset.
[Beignet]: 「Good job to the both of you. Eat up and have your fill.」
[Shigure]: 「Wow, thank you so much!」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much. I know I asked this of you suddenly... and I brought Shigure along on top of that.」
[Beignet]: 「With meals, the more the merrier. Besides, you two are family, aren't you?」
[Shigure]: 「Yes!」
[Beignet]: 「Then, help yourselves.」
[Everyone]: 「Time to eat.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Un. Well then... I guess I'll wash the dishes."
Beignet: "Fufu... I should head back to the kitchen too, you know?"
Before anyone knew it, their first day in France was coming to an end. 
The main branch of La Soleil closes before sunset, which they call 'ferme'.
Beignet: "You two did well today. Eat as much as your heart desires."
Shigure: "Wa! Thank you very much!"
Kashou: "Thank you. I only asked on a whim... and yet, even Shigure gets to enjoy this feast."
Beignet: "Meals are more fun when enjoyed with many people. Besides, aren't the three of you family?"
Shigure: "Hai!"
Beignet: "Now then, dig in."
All: "Itadakimasu itadakimasu"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
俺は師匠に教えてもらった身だ。成長を見せるのが、お礼の仕方だと思う。
[ベニエ]: 「楽しみにしているわ、嘉祥」
[時雨]: 「なるほど……でも、私はどうすれば……」
[ベニエ]: 「かまわないと言っているのに。時雨も、嘉祥たちに似て頑固だこと」
[時雨]: 「あっ、す、すみません……では、お言葉に甘えます」
[ベニエ]: 「そうしてちょうだい。これも自信作なのよ？　楽しんでほしいわ」
メインディッシュの肉料理のあと――師匠のケーキが、テーブルに並べられた。
[時雨]: 「すごい……きれいです……とっても」
[フレーズ]: 「いつも素敵だけれど、今日のは特別に……パティシエールの楽しい気持ちが伝わってきます」
[ベニエ]: 「そう？　よかったわ」
reference_answer:
Mentor is the one who taught me all I know, so I think showing her my growth is a valid form of thanks.
[Beignet]: 「I look forward to that, Kashou.」
[Shigure]: 「I see... But, what should I do...?」
[Beignet]: 「I'm telling you not to worry about it. You're just as hardheaded as Kashou and his kind.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, m-my apologies... Then, I will kindly accept your offer.」
[Beignet]: 「Do so, please. Now, I'm pretty proud of this one, too. I want you to enjoy it.」
After the main meat dish comes... slices of Mentor's cake, which line the table.
[Shigure]: 「Incredible... They're so pretty... Incredibly so.」
[Fraise]: 「Your cakes are always so pretty, but today's cakes are special... and I can really feel your joy from them, Pâtissière.」
[Beignet]: 「Really? That's great.」
ModelAnswer:
I was taught by Master. I believe showing growth is the best way to express my gratitude.
Beignet: "I'm looking forward to it, Kashou."
Shigure: "I see... But what should *I* do?"
Beignet: "Even though I said not to worry about that. Shigure seems just as stubborn as you all are."
Shigure: "Ah, s-sorry then... In that case, I'll take your advice."
Beignet: "Good. This is one of my masterpieces too? Enjoy it."
After the main course meat dish—Master’s cake was placed on the table.
Shigure: "Amazing… It’s beautiful… Truly.”
Fraise: “It’s always lovely, but today's feels especially special... I can feel a patissiere’s joy in this one."
Beignet: "Is that so? That makes me happy."

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
そのケーキは新作で、初めて食べる味だったが、間違いなく師匠の味で……
新鮮なのに懐かしかった。
[嘉祥]: 「……これを食べに、この街へと来たような気がします」
[ベニエ]: 「少しは落ちついたかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「わかりませんが……俺は、そんなに酷かったですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「迷子の仔猫のような顔をしていたわね」
[嘉祥]: 「お恥ずかしいかぎりです」
[嘉祥]: 「正直、お店の手伝いをしているときは、こんなことしている場合なのか？って気持ちも、少しはあったんです」
[嘉祥]: 「俺、クリスマスまでに、父親を納得させるケーキを作らなきゃいけないのに――って」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、働いているうちに、昔の気持ちを思い出せたというか」
[嘉祥]: 「洋菓子を作りたいと思った、最初の頃の想いが、よみがえってきて」
reference_answer:
The cake is a new recipe that I've never tasted before, but the flavor definitely belongs to my mentor...
It's a fresh yet nostalgic taste.
[Kashou]: 「...I feel like I've come to this city for the sole purpose of eating this.」
[Beignet]: 「Has it calmed you down a little?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know, but... was I that bad?」
[Beignet]: 「You had the face of a lost kitten.」
[Kashou]: 「Color me embarrassed.」
[Kashou]: 「Honestly, when I was helping with the shop today, I did kind of ask myself, 'Should I really be doing this right now?'」
[Kashou]: 「I thought, 'I should be baking the cake that'll satisfy my dad before Christmas'.」
[Kashou]: 「But, as I worked through the day, I kind of started to remember the old days.」
[Kashou]: 「My desire from when I first started off to make Western sweets had resuscitated.」
ModelAnswer:
That cake was a new creation, and I'd never tasted anything quite like it before. But there wasn’t any doubt that this flavor came from Beignet-san… 
It felt fresh yet nostalgic somehow.
Minaduki Kashou: "……I feel as though I came to this city just for the sake of tasting something like this."
Beignet: "Have you settled down a bit?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Not really, but was it that bad?"
Beignet: "You had the look on your face of a lost kitten.” 
Minaduki Kashou: “I’m deeply embarrassed to say so.”
Minaduki Kashou: "Honestly, when I'm helping out at the shop, there are moments where I wonder if this is really something that should be done."
Minaduki Kashou: "You see, before Christmas, I need to make a cake good enough for my father to approve of—" 
Minaduki Kashou: “But as time went on and I worked here, it reminded me how things used to feel.”
Minaduki Kashou: “I remembered the feelings from when I first wanted to create Western sweets."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "......I don't know, since I am not Kashou’s father. Perhaps it is true, or perhaps it isn't."
Beignet: "Sometimes even the speaker doesn't understand their own words.”
Beignet: “Words have 100 interpretations when received by 100 people; that is what they are like.”
Beignet: "What matters isn’t the words themselves, but rather..."
Beignet: "No... I may have spoken too much."

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」

[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」

[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?

[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "Now that I think about it..."

Kashou: "Is that how things are?"
Shigure: "My brother’s room at our family home is perfect because I maintain it daily."
Shigure: "I air out the rooms by opening the window, change the air, wipe down his desk with a dry cloth, and check if the bed feels comfortable.”
Kashou: “S-so that's how things are done?"
Do you really need to check the comfort of your sleeping arrangement every day...?
Shigure: "I think Beignet was likely waiting for her brother’s return all this time."
Kashou: "So, she did..."
