metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうが長く働いてたはずなのに、フレーズのほうが手際がいいくらいだもんな」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんは細かいところまで丁寧です。見習いたいです」
[嘉祥]: 「そうかな？」
[フレーズ]: 「ときどき、ぼーっとしてますけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……」
[フレーズ]: 「今の嘉祥さんは悩んでいて、考えなくちゃいけないことが、いっぱいあるんでしょうね……」
[フレーズ]: 「パティシエールから、少しだけ事情を聞きました」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中に、ぼんやりしていい理由にはならないけど」
[フレーズ]: 「そのぶんは、わたしが働きます」
[嘉祥]: 「なんと言ったらいいか……」
申し訳ないような、情けないような。もちろん、感謝の気持ちが一番大きいが。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I've worked here longer, yet Fraise is somehow more efficient."
Fraise: "Kashou-san is thorough in every detail. I want to learn from you."
Minaduki Kashou: "Is that so?"
Fraise: "Sometimes, though, you seem lost in thought..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Ugh..."
Fraise: "You're troubled now and have many things on your mind, don’t you? I believe it is quite a lot."
Fraise: "I heard some of the situation from Fraise-san.”
Minaduki Kashou: “Being absentminded during work isn't excusable though.”
Fraise: "Then allow me to take care of your portion instead."
Minaduki Kashou: "What should I say..."

It feels apologetic, and somewhat pathetic. Of course, gratitude is the biggest emotion here.

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、ケーキの作り方を教えてもらってる」
[嘉祥]: 「まだ、自慢するほど美味しくは作れないけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「よかったら、どうぞ。君のためにフレーズのマカロンを作ってみたんだ」
[？？？]: 「ふれーずの……？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだよ」
フレーズはフランス語で、苺の意味だ。
[？？？]: 「はむ……」
[？？？]: 「ふわぁぁ……！　おいしい！」
[嘉祥]: 「本当に！？」
[？？？]: 「うん、おいしー。ありがとう、おにーさん！」
[嘉祥]: 「君はいつまでここに居るかは知らないが、よかったら、お店の手伝いをしてあげてくれ」
[嘉祥]: 「そうすれば、みんなにこの美味しさを届けることが出来るんだ」
[？？？]: 「するー！！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm having her teach me how to make cakes.」
[Kashou]: 「Though, I'm still not good enough to make anything to brag about...」
[Kashou]: 「Have some, if you'd like. I tried to make some macaron à la fraise for you.」
[???]: 「Fraise...?」
[Kashou]: 「That's right.」
Fraise is French for strawberry.
[???]: 「Nom...」
[???]: 「Fwaah...! So yummy!」
[Kashou]: 「Really?!」
[???]: 「Yeah, it's so yummy. Thank you, Onii-san!」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know how long you're gonna be here for, but if it's okay with you, why don't you try helping around the shop.」
[Kashou]: 「If you do, you'll be able to deliver the tastiness to everyone else.」
[???]: 「I will!」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Ah, I'm being taught how to make cake."
Kashou: "I still can’t quite make it taste good enough to brag about though…"
Kashou: "If you like, please have one. I made Fraise macarons especially for you.”
Unknown Speaker: “Fraise…?”
Kashou: "That's right."
Fraise means strawberry in French. 
Unknown Speaker: "Hamu..."
Unknown Speaker: "Fuwaaa! Delicious!"
Kashou: "Really?"
Unknown Speaker: "Un, oishii. Thank you, onii-san!”
Kashou: “I don’t know how long you'll be staying here but if you want to help out at the shop…” 
Kashou: “Then we can share this deliciousness with everyone.”
Unknown Speaker: "Suru!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「……どうしましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いや……ちょっと昔のことを思い出して」
[嘉祥]: 「実は、少しの間だけ、フレーズとは一緒に暮らしてたんだよ」
[嘉祥]: 「フレーズはすごく小さい仔ネコだったし、ほんの短い間だったから、覚えてないと思うけど」
[嘉祥]: 「君は、幼い頃から賢い子だったよ」
[フレーズ]: 「あ、あの……」
[嘉祥]: 「ん？」
[フレーズ]: 「実は……覚えています……嘉祥さんが、ここに住んでいたこと」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そうだったのかい！？」
[フレーズ]: 「すみません。会ったときに、気づいたんですけれど……」
[嘉祥]: 「言ってくれればよかったのに」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんには、何か大切な用事があるようですし……」
[フレーズ]: 「覚えてる、だけですから」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「...What is the matter?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no. Just a little trip down memory lane.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, I lived together with you, Fraise, albeit for just a short while.」
[Kashou]: 「You were a super small kitten back then, and it was a really short time, so I don't think you remember.」
[Kashou]: 「You've been smart ever since you were a kid.」
[Fraise]: 「U-Um...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」
[Fraise]: 「Actually... I do remember... I remember that you used to live here.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Wait, you do?!」
[Fraise]: 「I'm sorry. I realized right when we met, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」
[Fraise]: 「Well, you seemed to have more pressing matters to attend to...」
[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "......What's wrong?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No, I was just remembering something from the past."
Minaduki Kashou: "Actually, for a short time, Fraise and I lived together."
Minaduki Kashou: "You were such a tiny kitten then, it wasn’t very long ago so you probably don't remember though.”
Minaduki Kashou: “Even from when you were little, you always had your wits about you.”
Fraise: "Ah... um..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Hm?"
Fraise: "Actually... I do remember... that Minaduki-san used to live here."
Minaduki Kashou: "Huh? Oh really!?”
Fraise: “Sorry. When we met, it came back to me though…”
Minaduki Kashou: "You should've said something earlier.”
Fraise: "It seems Minaduki-san has some important business here..." 
Fraise: "I just remembered that’s all."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
箸の持ち方は完璧だし、椀の扱い方まで知っていた。
[嘉祥]: 「こちらは、デザートです。和食を希望されたので、合うようにアレンジしていますが」
[ベニエ]: 「おやおや……抹茶のモンブランね？　どんな味か興味があったのよ」
[時雨]: 「素敵です、兄様」
[フレーズ]: 「緑色のモンブラン……」
[嘉祥]: 「見た目は違和感があるかな？　こっちも、よかったら」
[フレーズ]: 「あ……」
[ベニエ]: 「あら、フレーズのマカロンかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「はい。さっき昔のことを思い出しまして。また作ってみようかと」
[時雨]: 「わぁ、可愛らしいです、兄様。いただきます」
[フレーズ]: 「…………はむ」
[フレーズ]: 「…………ッ！！」
reference_answer:
She held the chopsticks perfectly and even knew how to hold her soup bowl.
[Kashou]: 「Here's dessert. Since you all wanted Japanese food, I made this one fit the theme.」
[Beignet]: 「My, oh my... The green tea Mont Blanc, is it? I was curious how it would taste.」
[Shigure]: 「This is wonderful, Nii-sama.」
[Fraise]: 「A green Mont Blanc...」
[Kashou]: 「Does it strike you as odd? I also made these, if you'd like.」
[Fraise]: 「Oh...」
[Beignet]: 「Oh, macaron à la fraise?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, I had a little trip down memory lane, so I figured I would try making them again.」
[Shigure]: 「Wow, they're so adorable, Nii-sama. Thank you so much.」
[Fraise]: 「...Om.」
[Fraise]: 「...!!」
ModelAnswer:
They had perfect chopstick manners, and even knew how to handle a bowl.
Kashou: "This is dessert. I've arranged it so that it goes well with the Japanese cuisine you requested."
Beignet: "Oh my... Matcha mont blanc? I was curious about what flavor this would be."
Shigure: "It looks lovely, brother."
Fraise: "A green-colored mont blanc..."
Kashou: "Is its appearance a bit off putting perhaps? Here's another one if you like it."
Fraise: "Ah…"
Beignet: "Oh my, Fraise’s macaron?"
Kashou: "Yes. I was reminiscing about the past earlier and thought to make some again.”
Shigure: “Waah, how cute, brother! Thank you for this treat.”
Fraise: "…………hamu."
Fraise: "…………tsu!!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「わたし、お兄さんに憧れて……お店を手伝っていました」
[ベニエ]: 「それでここの飼いネコになってずっと手伝いたいって言いだして、名前もフレーズにしたのね」
[嘉祥]: 「確かネコは３か月の頃に名前を決めるが、そこから来たのか……」
[フレーズ]: 「今、お兄さんは大変なときだから……わたしのことなんて、言わないようにって思っていたのに」
[フレーズ]: 「ずっと、夢見ていたマカロンを食べたら……我慢できなくなってしまって……」
[時雨]: 「いいんですよ、フレーズ。そんなに我慢しなくても、兄様はわかってくれます」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、もちろんだよ。覚えててくれて、ありがとうな、フレーズ」
[嘉祥]: 「それと、師匠のことも。いっぱい手伝ってくれて、感謝してる」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」
[Shigure]: 「It's fine, Fraise. You needn't contain yourself so badly. Nii-sama understands.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "I've been helping out in the shop, admiring my older brother..."
Beignet: "And that led to you wanting to stay here as a pet cat and continue assisting? You even chose Fraise for your name."
Kashou: "So it all started around three months old when cats typically get named... I see now how things came about."
Fraise: "I thought, since my brother is going through such a difficult time right now, he wouldn't want me to bother him with this..." 
Fraise: "But after finally tasting the macarons that I had always dreamed of eating, it became too much for me to resist!"
Shigure: "It's alright Fraise. You don’t need to hold back so much; my brother will understand."
Kashou: "Ah yes, absolutely. Thank you for remembering everything, Fraise."
Kashou: "And thank you as well, Mentor, for all your help and support."

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「泣いてたわたしに……マカロンを作ってくれた、お兄さん……っ」
[フレーズ]: 「嬉しかったです……っ……でも、それを言えないまま……お別れの意味も知らないうちに……」
[嘉祥]: 「すまない。君が来たときには、もう帰国は決まってたんだ」
[フレーズ]: 「お兄さん……こうして再会……できるなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうこそ、驚いたよ。すっかり見違えるように大きくなってて」
[フレーズ]: 「わたし、お兄さんとの約束……守れましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、もちろんだよ。そうですよね、師匠？」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、とっても。フレーズには、いっぱいお手伝いしてもらっているわ」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……ありがとうございます……パティシエール」
[時雨]: 「フレーズ……よかったですね……ぐす」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I'd never forget you for making me macarons when I was crying...」
[Fraise]: 「I was so happy... but... I couldn't say that... and by the time I knew what a 'farewell' was, you had...」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry. By the time you came, I was already scheduled to go back home.」
[Fraise]: 「I never thought the two of us would reunite...」
[Kashou]: 「I'm just as surprised. You got so big that I almost didn't recognize you.」
[Fraise]: 「Did I... keep my promise to you?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, you sure did. Isn't that right, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, incredibly well. Fraise has been an excellent help to me this whole time.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... Thank you very much, Pâtissière.」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise... I'm so glad for you... Sniff.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "To me, who was crying... the older brother made macarons for me..."
Fraise: "I was happy... but I couldn't say it then... without even knowing what farewell meant..."
Kashou: "Sorry. By the time you arrived, my return trip had already been decided."
Fraise: "Older brother... to be able to reunite like this again..."
Kashou: "I was surprised too. You’ve grown so much I barely recognized you.” 
Fraise: “Have I kept our promise, older brother?”
Kashou: "Yes, of course. Right, Mentor?"
Beignet: "Indeed, very much so. Fraise has helped me with many things."
Fraise: "Uuu... thank you very much... Pastry Chef.” 
Shigure: “Fraise… I’m glad for you… sob”

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「あ、あの……お兄さん……」
[嘉祥]: 「なんだい？」
[フレーズ]: 「また、昔みたいに……お兄さんと呼んでも、いいですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「もちろん」
[時雨]: 「兄様を慕う者どうし、仲間ですね、フレーズ！」
[フレーズ]: 「は、はい……わたし、時雨さんほどじゃないと思いますけど……」
[時雨]: 「遠慮しなくていいのですよ。さあ、素直になって」
[フレーズ]: 「本当に、そういうのじゃないですから……！」
[時雨]: 「今なら、スペシャルサービスで兄様の寝顔ブロマイドがつきます」
[フレーズ]: 「えっ、なんですか？　寝顔って……？」
[嘉祥]: 「おい、時雨……？」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「U-Um... Onii-san...」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah?」
[Fraise]: 「Would it be all right if I called you Onii-san again? Just like the old days?」
[Kashou]: 「Of course it would.」
[Shigure]: 「Anyone who appreciates Nii-sama is a friend of mine, Fraise!」
[Fraise]: 「R-Right... Although, I don't think I'm quite at the level you are, Shigure-san...」
[Shigure]: 「You needn't be so reserved. Come now, be honest with yourself.」
[Fraise]: 「No, really, I'm telling the truth...!」
[Shigure]: 「If you act now, then I will throw in a Sleeping Nii-sama bromide as a special gift.」
[Fraise]: 「Huh? What is a Sleeping...?」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, Shigure...?」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee...」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "Ah, um... Onii-san..."
Kashou: "What is it?"
Fraise: "Can I call you Onii-san again like in the old days?"
Kashou: "Of course."
Shigure: "We're comrades who cherish our brother, Fraise!"
Fraise: "Y-yes... I don’t think I am quite as devoted to him as Shigure-san is though..."
Shigure: "Don't hold back. Now then, be honest with your feelings."
Fraise: "It isn't really like that at all..."
Shigure: "If you act now, we will include a special service - a broma of Onii-sama’s sleeping face!"
Fraise: "Eh? What do you mean by 'sleeping face?'"
Kashou: "Hey, Shigure...?"
Beignet: "Hehe..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「大変です、お兄さん！　外に行列が……！」
[嘉祥]: 「おお……昨日に増して、すごいお客さんの数になってるな。まるで、クリスマスじゃないか」
[時雨]: 「元から知る人ぞ知る名店でしたが、ＳＮＳでさらに火が点いたのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「人事みたいに言うな」
[時雨]: 「すみません。まさか、ここまでの効果があるとは」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さん……やりすぎだと思います」
[時雨]: 「なにを言っているんですか、フレーズ？　私だけが理由では、ありませんよ」
[時雨]: 「あなたのことも、とっても話題になっています。ほら！　ここにも、ほら！」
時雨が突き出したスマホには、フレーズを賞讃する言葉が並んでいた。
会いに行く、と宣言しているお客さんが何人もいる。おそらく、店の前にできた行列の中に……
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Big trouble, Onii-san! There is a line outside...!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」
[Shigure]: 「This shop has always been a popular spot among those in the know, but the social media presence seems to have sparked a bigger flame.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」
[Shigure]: 「What are you even saying, Fraise? I am not the only cause here.」
[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "It's terrible, Master! There’s a line outside...!"
Kashou: "Oh my… Even more than yesterday. Quite the number of customers we have here now. It feels like Christmas."
Shigure: "Even before this, it was known as an excellent shop among those in the know, but SNS really lit things up further.”
Kashou: “Don’t speak so impersonally.”
Shigure: "My apologies. I didn't think there would be such a big effect."
Fraise: "Shigure-san... You may have gone too far with this one."
Shigure: "What are you saying, Fraise? It isn't just me who is responsible for it.”
Shigure: “You’re also quite the topic of conversation. Look! Here and here!”
The smartphone Shigure pointed at displayed words praising Fraise. 
There were several customers declaring they would come visit soon; likely among those in the line forming outside the shop...

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「む、無理！　無理です！　わたし、そういうのは……目立つのは苦手なんですぅ」
[時雨]: 「誰でも、最初はそうです。そのうち、気持ちよくなりますから」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さんみたいになったら、困ります……」
[時雨]: 「フレーズ……？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨、フレーズ、おしゃべりは後だ。お客さんを待たせないように、バリバリ働くぞ！」
[時雨]: 「は、はい！」
[フレーズ]: 「……わかりました、お兄さん。がんばります！」
[ベニエ]: 「申し訳ないわね、もう材料がないのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「もう今日は閉めるしかないな」
[時雨]: 「最後は撮影会みたいになっていましたね」
[フレーズ]: 「……カメラ、こわいです」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「N-No way! I can't! I don't like that... I don't like being the center of attention!」
[Shigure]: 「Everyone is like that at first. You will come to like it in time.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think I'd like turning out like you, Shigure-san...」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise...?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, Fraise, save the chit-chat for later. Let's get working so we don't keep these customers waiting!」
[Shigure]: 「R-Right!」
[Fraise]: 「...Very well, Onii-san. I'll do my best!」
[Beignet]: 「Sorry. We're all out of ingredients.」
[Kashou]: 「Guess we'll have to close up shop for today, then.」
[Shigure]: 「It turned into more of a photo session toward the end.」
[Fraise]: 「...Cameras are scary.」
ModelAnswer:

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "There's no mistake. The buzz created quite a stir, and many people researched the information after it became popular; that was enough to establish its reputation as an excellent shop. It’s all about synergy."
Kashou: "Personally speaking, I am glad more people have come to know Master Beignet’s wonderful cakes.”
Fraise: “Uuu… if this continues tomorrow too, things might get a bit rough.”
Beignet: “Today was special, surely enough.”
Beignet: “I don't think we will see lines like today again tomorrow."
Fraise: "You are right... Tomorrow it’ll just be me and the other patissiere once more.”

We were scheduled to depart tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is 7 hours, so if we wanted to return within our agreed upon three days, that was when we needed to leave.
In the end, I still didn't know what exactly it was that I lacked in myself.
I felt considerably more at ease emotionally though...

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」

[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」

Kashou Minaduki: "Oh... well... I still don’t quite understand what my father wants from me.”
Kashou Minaduki: “But coming to this place and helping out in the shop reminded me."
Kashou Minaduki: "I really want to make cakes that will put smiles on everyone's faces again."
Kashou Minaduki: "Mentor, your cakes are truly delicious with such a gentle flavor... they always bring joy to people.”
Beignet: "...Thank you. I am glad to hear you say so.”

Kashou Minaduki: "Although I said that was what I aimed for, it felt like something else had taken hold of me."

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you very much."
Minaduki Kashou: "Speaking of which, the reason why I make cakes is something that has been repeated several times... but Master hasn't heard my story before?"
Beignet: "... That’s right."
Minaduki Kashou: "No, when asked previously, you said it was because I am a patissiere..." 
Beignet: "Fufu... Was that so?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Then what about the reason why you became one?"
Beignet: "... This shop is something from my grandmother’s generation and we've been making cakes here for generations."
Beignet: "It isn't quite on par with your family, but I believe there are traditions that need to be protected.”

Question:

洋菓子を教えてもらうために弟子入りするのに、実家の和菓子屋が老舗だという話は、場違いな気がして避けていたのだが……
[ベニエ]: 「それは……」
[時雨]: 「すみません、兄様！　私が、今朝」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[時雨]: 「兄様の状況を知っておいていただく必要がある、と考えまして。差し出がましい真似を……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、いいんだ。隠してたわけじゃないから」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ……時雨から事情を聞いたのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだったんですね。あっ、余計な話をして、すみません。このラ・ソレイユに伝統があるという話でしたよね」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Shigure]: 「I thought she needed to know about your situation, so I did something rather intrusive...」
[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hm? Oh, I did mention my family runs a traditional sweets shop but...did I ever say anything about it having such history?"
I'd been avoiding the topic of our old-established confectionery business when seeking tutelage in Western pastries as it felt out of place. 
Beignet: "That is..."
Shigure: "Excuse me, brother! This morning, I thought you should know."
Kashou: "Huh?"
Shigure: "I considered that knowing your situation was necessary and took the liberty to inform you about this matter."
Kashou: "No, it's alright. It wasn’t something hidden from me.”
Beignet: “Yes... I heard everything from Shigure.” 
Kashou: "Oh right! Sorry for bringing up unnecessary things again. We were discussing the history of La Soleil, weren't we?"

metadata:

[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「私たちは結婚して、息子が生まれて……しばらくは３人で暮らしていたの」
[ベニエ]: 「その頃にね……私の作ったお菓子が、皆を笑顔にする、と息子が言ったのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「息子がママはお日様みたいだねと言ってくれた」
[ベニエ]: 「この店の名前をラ・ソレイユにしたのは、その言葉があってのことなの」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど、そういう由来が……」
ようやくラ・ソレイユの由来が聞けて、俺は嬉しかった。
しかし、ただ幸せなだけの話ではないようだった。
[時雨]: 「……ご子息を……ご家族を愛していたのですね」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、それはもう」
[ベニエ]: 「でも、私は日本を去らなければならなくなったの」
[ベニエ]: 「この店を継ぐ予定だった兄が、早世してしまって……」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "We got married, and had a son... we lived together as three for quite some time."
Beignet: "Around that time... my son said that the sweets I made would make everyone smile."
Beignet: "My son told me 'Mama is like sunshine'."
Beignet: "The reason this shop's name became La Soleil, was because of those words."
Kashou: "I see, so it has such origins..."
Finally hearing about the origin of La Soleil made me happy. 
However, I sensed that it wasn’t just a story full of happiness alone.
Shigure: "...you loved your son... and your family?"
Beignet: "Yes, very much."
Beignet: "But then, I had to leave Japan."
Beignet: "My older brother was supposed to take over this shop but he passed away early..."

reference_answer:

[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」

[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "I had no idea something like that happened..."
Beignet: "Back then, I was still young and not very wise. Chasing after so many things..."
Beignet: "It wasn't until losing them all that I realized what truly mattered."
Fraise: "Was it your family... the most important thing?"
Beignet: "Yes... for me, sweets were something my son would smile about when he ate them."
Beignet: "The pastries I make are flavored with memories of praise from a young boy who found everything delicious."
Beignet: "I continue to bake now because maybe one day, my son will eat and enjoy it again..."
Beignet: "... It's that kind of regret."
Kashou: "Um... what about your family? What happened?"

Staying at the shop as a lodger while helping out every single day, I never received any calls or letters from anyone resembling relatives.

[Beignet]: 「...I suppose that is one way of thinking about it.」

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, if your son is an adult now, I'm pretty sure that he's considering how you must've felt, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」

Beignet: "Is that not a convenient fantasy for me?"

Kashou: "Forgive this presumptuous suggestion.”

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「もう一度、考えてみるわね？」
[嘉祥]: 「……すみません、師匠。悲しい話をさせてしまいました」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……いつかは、話しておいたほうがいいと思っていたから」
[ベニエ]: 「貴方は道を間違えないと思うわ、嘉祥」
[嘉祥]: 「俺が、道を？　……そうだと、いいのですが」
師匠は家族と離ればなれになったことを後悔している。
俺は自分から家を出て、両親とは疎遠になっていた。
母親の誕生日に言い争いをしたっきり、一度も連絡すら取っていない。
すでに道を間違えているような気がしなくもないが……
[ベニエ]: 「今の嘉祥には、パティシエとしての実力だけじゃなく、とても大切なものが身についているもの」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「But, I'll try thinking it over again, okay?」
[Kashou]: 「...Forgive me, Mentor. I didn't mean to make you tell such a sad tale.」
[Beignet]: 「No, I had been thinking I should talk about it eventually anyway.」
[Beignet]: 「I know you're on the right path, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Me? On the right path? Well, I'd... certainly like to think so.」
Mentor regrets the fact that she was separated from her family.
I left my house voluntarily and became estranged from my parents.
Ever since that verbal spat I had on my mom's birthday, I haven't gotten in contact with them even once.
I'd say it definitely feels as though I'm on the wrong path, but...
[Beignet]: 「Right now, you have not only mastered the skills of a capable pâtissièr, but something else very important.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "Shall we reconsider?"
Minaduki Kashou: "...I apologize, Mentor. I've burdened you with a sad tale."
Beignet: "No... I was thinking it would be better to discuss this eventually anyway."
Beignet: "I don’t think you will stray from the right path, Minaduki Kashou.”
Minaduki Kashou: “My path? ...If only that were true.”
The Mentor regrets being separated from his family. 
As for me, I left home on my own accord and have become estranged with both parents.
I haven't contacted them even once since the argument we had during mother’s birthday.
It feels like I may already be off course...
Beignet: "Right now, Minaduki Kashou possesses something far more important than just skill as a pastry chef."

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Heave...」
Shigure pulls her rather big carry-on case. Looks pretty heavy.
[Kashou]: 「This was a two-night trip by plane, which means it was roughly a one-night stay. You're packing quite the load for such a short time.」
[Shigure]: 「A girl needs many tools to keep up appearances.」
[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I wouldn't put too much faith in getting your luggage delivered to the airport in France.」
[Shigure]: 「O-Oh, is that so?」
[Kashou]: 「Coming from personal experience... you're pretty much leaving it to chance.」
[Shigure]: 「Well, that sounds no good.」
ModelAnswer:

Shigure is pulling a large carry case. It looks quite heavy.
Kashou: "Since this time we're flying for two nights, it will be almost like an overnight trip, right? Quite the big luggage you have there?"
Shigure: "Women need many tools to maintain their appearance."
Shigure: "And with both a dress and kimono, I couldn’t wear the same shoes or underwear. Plus, loungewear was necessary as well.”
Shigure: “I hadn't researched how French delivery services work yet either.”
Kashou: "Ah... maybe it is best not to rely too much on French deliveries."
Shigure: "So, really?"

Shigure: “That’s troublesome…”

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:

Shigure: "A……"
Shigure: "Brother, something feels different about you…"
Kashou: "Huh? Even until now, I would have been considerate enough towards my little sister carrying heavy luggage like this?"
Kashou: "I don't think of myself as someone so callous. Rather, it was always a bit too much kindness on my part..."
Shigure: "Yes. Both then and now, you are very kind and wonderful."
Shigure: "But previously, I believe that without me saying anything about the weight being heavy for me to carry alone, you would have said something like 'Let me help' before I could even ask."
Kashou: "Is that so...?"
Shigure: "That in itself is very delightful and makes me grateful."
Shigure: "But now, my brother has left the decision up to me instead."

[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Surely you're unaware. It is a small change, after all. If not for me being an older brother enthusiast like myself, it would have gone unnoticed."
Kashou: "O-oh..."
It feels strange that my younger sister knows more about me than I do...
Shigure: "Not just in the past few days, but surely a culmination of every day up until now has changed you, older brother."
Kashou: "I don't think anything really changed within myself though. If Shigure says so then maybe it did change somehow?"
It was my time spent with cats and Master’s words that shaped me into who I am today. 
Kashou: "Well, Master had quite the story to tell after all. Even I will learn something from this."
Shigure: "Have you learned anything then?"
Kashou: "Probably so. I've also thought about why I make Western sweets myself now."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "I thought it might have just been words."
Shigure: "No way! It wasn't only about the words..."
Kashou: "Well, I took a deep look into what was really in my heart... and considered how I truly felt."
Kashou: "In the end, all I want is for Father to acknowledge me."
Kashou: "Is this just some late-onset rebellion at an age like mine?"
Kashou: "I guess that means I'm a self-centered person driven by my desire for approval." 
Kashou: "Sorry about this, Shigure... did you feel disappointed in me somehow?"
Shigure: "So is that why Onii-sama makes Western sweets?"
Kashou: "If it wasn’t like that, I wouldn't be so bothered by Father rejecting my ideas."
Shigure: "Maybe there really are feelings along those lines..."

[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "By the way, did Shigure get permission for going to France on her own?"
Shigure: "Ugh..."
Cinnamon: "Ahh~, she only left a note so Mom was really mad!"
Awayuki: "Yeah. She just suddenly went without saying anything beforehand, which made me worry."
Shigure: "I apologize deeply for that..."
Awayuki: "But I guess Kashou came along with her?"
Kashou: "I was surprised too though."
Awayuki: "The financiers she brought back as souvenirs were delicious so I forgave her♪"

Mother gets really angry when upset, but usually lets things slide if there's tasty food.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Wa, a Christmas present perhaps!? Thank you very much, Mother!"
Awayuki: "It might be a little early yet, but Kashou will probably get angry and leave again."
Shigure: "Ugh..."
Kashou: "S-that won't happen today! Trust me on this one."
Awayuki: "Yes, to you too, Kashou."
Kashou: "A, uh... thank you."
Awayuki: "Why don’t we open it?"
Following her instructions, I removed the wrapping paper and opened a small box. 
Kashou: "... A picture frame?"
It doesn't seem like there is any photo inside yet.
Awayuki: "I think decorating your room with one of this year's memories would be fun."
Now that you mention it, I recall Shigure giving her mother a similar gift for her birthday when she said she wanted one.

[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female

[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "Master's! Ah, but which photo... hmm..."
Chocola: "Ah, I will use the one from La Soleil’s grand opening. The one with Master and Vanilla taken together!"
Vanilla: "Good idea. Good choice. I think so too."
Maple: "What should I do?"
Cinnamon: "That would be good, right? From when we sang on a boat together.”
Cinnamon: “You had pictures taken along with the video as well, didn’t you?”
Maple: "Ah..."
Maple: "... Yes. It's slightly embarrassing though."
Maple: "That is my most precious memory of this past year."
Cinnamon: "To Maple-chan’s most important memories... I am also in it too… haa haa… uhh.”
Maple: “Huh? But the picture only has me on it?”
